name: peach
content:
peach noun
(FRUIT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 [ C or U ] a round fruit with sweet yellow flesh that has a lot of juice, a slightly furry red and yellow skin, and a large seed in its centre: Would you like peaches and cream for dessert?
Rosemary Calvert/Photographer's Choice/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesthe fuzzy skin of a peacha succulent peacha peach melbaWould you like peaches and cream for dessert?One or two of the peaches had bruises on them.

peach noun
(EXCELLENT)
[ S ] informal someone or something that is excellent or very pleasing: He's a real peach of a guy.
